resources.string: CREATE table timeline ( _id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,created_at INTEGER, status TEXT, user TEXT, isFavorite INTEGER, isDisaster INTEGER);
CREATE table AddressesTable ( _mac TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, met_at INTEGER, tweetsNumber INTEGER);
CREATE table FavoritesTable ( _id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,created_at INTEGER, status TEXT, user TEXT);
CREATE table MentionsTable ( _id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,created_at INTEGER, status TEXT, user TEXT);
CREATE table PicturesTable ( user TEXT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, image BLOB);
